summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Mary Avenue Northwest from West 75th Street to West 85th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8820 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
